definition: the bleating of sheep/final particle which transforms statements into questions that indicate doubt or surprise (Cantonese)
mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls

sentences.english: Goat sister sent a letter, bleating.
Goat sister sent a letter, bleating.
One time I asked him, you know China?
sentences.chinese: 有次我問佢，你知中國咩？

sentences.english: Do you think we'll come away from Sepang with a clearer idea of the pecking order?
sentences.chinese: 你認爲雪邦之後我們對排名會有更清晰的認識咩？

sentences.english: Any good suggestion for a wood saw?
sentences.chinese: 想買把手鋸用來鋸木。有咩好介紹？

sentences.english: The soft and super-soft tyres stood up well in Monaco. Will the same be true here?
sentences.chinese: 軟胎和超軟胎在摩納哥表現良好。這裏也會好咩？

sentences.english: A while back Hsiao Mo at Sheep House had made a Disney Piglet.
sentences.chinese: 之前看到羊咩家的小魔做了一隻狄士尼小豬。

sentences.english: Remember Silverstone '91, when Nigel Mansell gave Ayrton Senna a lift?
sentences.chinese: 還記得91年曼賽爾也給塞納搭車來着咩？

sentences.english: Goat sister to swallow the letter, bleating.
Goat sister to swallow the letter, bleating.
I heard sheep baaing in the barn.
sentences.chinese: 我聽見羊在圈裏咩咩地叫。

sentences.english: I heard sheep baaing in the barn.
sentences.chinese: 我聽見羊在圈裏咩咩地叫。

sentences.english: But strangely, Baabaa didn't stop running, but started sprinting.
sentences.chinese: 可是咩咩沒有停下來，它還接着奔跑。

sentences.english: But strangely, Baabaa didn't stop running, but started sprinting.
sentences.chinese: 可是咩咩沒有停下來，它還接着奔跑。

definition: phonetic a, similar to 呵/-azine, see 吖嗪[a1 qin2]
phonetic ga (used in rendering Tibetan and Mongolian sounds)/Tibetan Ge: language of Buddha/(dialect) final particle similar to 了[le5] (esp. in Yunnan)
suffix, used to form interrogative 什麼|什么[shen2 me5], what?, indefinite 這麼|这么[zhe4 me5] thus, etc
(slang) alternative for 哎呦[ai1 you1] "oh my!"
dark reddish purple/Internet slang abbr. for 這樣子|这样子[zhe4 yang4 zi5]
to squint/what? (Cantonese)/see also 乜嘢[mie1 ye3]
final particle expressing exhortation, admiration etc
Internet slang for 怎麼|怎么[zen3 me5]
